    UI tests for US 02.07.03: As an organizer I want to send a notification to all cancelled entrants These instrumented tests verify that: Organizers can access the CancelledListFragment UI The "Send Cancelled List Notification" button is visible and enabled Tapping the button opens a dialog titled "Send Cancelled List Notification" The dialog displays both "OK" and "Cancel" actions The dialog dismisses correctly when "Cancel" is pressed The dialog dismisses correctly when "OK" is pressed (confirming the action) Note: For reliable test execution, it's recommended to disable animations on the test device/emulator before running these tests:
